A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't hate it as much as everyone else\, but the more I think about it\, the less I like this movie. I was really excited to see it after Rogue One\, too. I won't be seeing anymore Rian Johnson Star Wars movies because he obviously isn't a Star Wars fan. That wasn't Luke Skywalker. At least Mark Hamill did a great job with the bad script that he had!
